root.name: Vertex Dispenser
root.description: OverviewPuzzle game with mathematical elements. By capturing surfaces and manipulating colors you have to try to take over the complete shape.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 1.6GHzMemory: 512MBHard Disk Space: 30MBVideo Card: 128MBMac System RequirementsOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.Processor: 1.6GHzMemory: 512MBHard Disk Space: 30MBVideo Card: 128MB
